00021 #include "MMDataSetDataWriter.h"
00022 #include "DataSetHeaderWriter.h"
00023 #include "FileOutput.h"
00024 #include "FileWriteException.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 
00029 const int32_t MAXFILEMAPSIZE = 1024*1024*200;
00030 
00031 /*
00032  * Constructor
00033  */
00034 MMDataSetDataWriter::MMDataSetDataWriter(DataSetHeader& dsHdr, const std::string& name)
00035 : dataSetHeader(dsHdr), filename(name)
00036 {
00037         dataSetDataSize = dataSetHeader.GetDataSize();
00038         bytesPerRow = dataSetHeader.GetRowSize();
00039 }
00040 
00041 /*
00042  * Destructor
00043  */
00044 MMDataSetDataWriter::~MMDataSetDataWriter()
00045 {
00046         Close();
00047 }
00048 
00049 /*
00050  * Opens the writer.
00051  */
00052 bool MMDataSetDataWriter::Open()
00053 {
00054         Close();
00055         return OpenData();
00056 }
00057 
00058 /*
00059  * Open a memory-mapped view of the DataSet data section.
00060  */
00061 bool MMDataSetDataWriter::OpenData()
00062 {
00063         if (dataSetHeader.GetRowCnt() == 0 ||
00064                         dataSetHeader.GetColumnCnt() == 0)
00065         {
00066                 return false;
00067         }
00068 
00069         int32_t rowsToMap = GetMaxRowsToMap();
00070         if (rowsToMap > dataSetHeader.GetRowCnt())
00071                 rowsToMap = dataSetHeader.GetRowCnt();
00072 
00073         mmfile.SetFilename(filename);
00074         if (mmfile.Open(READ_AND_WRITE, ALLOWREAD_AND_WRITE) &&
00075                         mmfile.MapData(dataSetHeader.GetDataStartFilePos(), rowsToMap*bytesPerRow))
00076         {
00077         }
00078         else
00079         {
00080                 return false;
00081         }
00082         return true;
00083 
00084 }
00085 
00086 /*
00087  * Closes the writer.
00088  */
00089 bool MMDataSetDataWriter::Close()
00090 {
00091         mmfile.Close();
00092         return true;
00093 }
00094 
00095 /*
00096  * Get the suggested maximum number of DataSet rows to map.
00097  */
00098 int32_t MMDataSetDataWriter::GetMaxRowsToMap()
00099 {
00100         if (bytesPerRow == 0)
00101                 return 0;
00102         return MAXFILEMAPSIZE / bytesPerRow;
00103 }
00104 
00105 /*
00106  * Maps the pixel data for access starting at firstRow and continuing for rowsToMap.
00107  */
00108 bool MMDataSetDataWriter::MapData(int32_t firstRow, int32_t rowsToMap)
00109 {
00110         if (firstRow + rowsToMap > dataSetHeader.GetRowCnt())
00111                 rowsToMap = dataSetHeader.GetRowCnt() - firstRow;
00112 
00113         return mmfile.MapData(firstRow*bytesPerRow+dataSetHeader.GetDataStartFilePos(), rowsToMap*bytesPerRow);
00114 }
00115 
00116 /*
00117  * Get a pointer to the data that has been mapped for access.
00118  */
00119 char* MMDataSetDataWriter::GetMappedDataPtr()
00120 {
00121         return mmfile.GetDataPtr();
00122 }
00123 
00124 /*
00125  * Get the first DataSet row that has been mapped.
00126  */
00127 int32_t MMDataSetDataWriter::GetFirstRowMapped()
00128 {
00129         return ( (mmfile.GetFirstMappedBytePos()-dataSetHeader.GetDataStartFilePos())/bytesPerRow );
00130 }
00131 
00132 /*
00133  * Get the number of DataSet rows that have been mapped.
00134  */
00135 int32_t MMDataSetDataWriter::GetRowsMapped()
00136 {
00137         return ( mmfile.GetBytesMapped()/bytesPerRow );
00138 }
